content: As of 1950, the European Coal and Steel Community began to unite European countries economically and politically in order to secure lasting peace.
translations: ita:Negli anni Cinquanta la Comunità europea del carbone e dell’acciaio comincia ad unire i paesi europei sul piano economic
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by al_ex_an_der (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
